schemes.name: Rashtriya Gokul Mission
schemes.department: Department of Animal Husbandry & Dairying, Government of India
schemes.description: Supports genetic improvement of indigenous cattle breeds through AI services, breeding centres and productivity enhancement.
schemes.benefits: Improved milk productivity, better cattle genetics and breeding infrastructure.
schemes.eligibility: Dairy farmers, cattle rearers, cooperatives and registered breeding units.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through State Animal Husbandry Department or KMF cooperative network.

schemes.name: Karnataka Pashu Bhagya Scheme
schemes.department: Department of Animal Husbandry & Veterinary Services, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides subsidy assistance for livestock units, fodder support and small ruminant rearing.
schemes.benefits: Income generation, livestock asset creation and fodder assistance.
schemes.eligibility: Small and marginal farmers, rural households and women SHG beneficiaries.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Taluk Veterinary Office or AHVS Department.

schemes.name: National Livestock Mission (NLM)
schemes.description: Supports goatery, sheep rearing, backyard poultry, fodder development and livestock-based enterprises.
schemes.benefits: Enterprise development, income diversification and fodder support.
schemes.eligibility: Individuals, SHGs, FPOs and livestock groups meeting scheme criteria.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through State Animal Husbandry Department.

schemes.name: Livestock Insurance Scheme
schemes.scope: National Insurance Scheme (Implemented via State Agencies)
schemes.description: Provides subsidised insurance coverage to protect farmers against economic loss due to livestock death.
schemes.benefits: Financial risk protection and income security.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers owning notified livestock with tagging and registration.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Veterinary Department or authorised insurance providers.

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY)
schemes.department: Department of Fisheries, Government of India
schemes.description: Provides assistance for inland fisheries, aquaculture units, hatcheries, processing, cold chain and marketing.
schemes.benefits: Infrastructure development, productivity enhancement and market linkage.
schemes.eligibility: Fish farmers, SHGs, cooperatives, FPOs and fisheries entrepreneurs.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through District Fisheries Office or online portal.

schemes.name: Karnataka Inland Fisheries & Aquaculture Support Programme
schemes.department: Department of Fisheries, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Supports construction of fish ponds, fingerling stocking and inland aquaculture development.
schemes.benefits: Enhanced fish production and livelihood support.
schemes.eligibility: Registered fish farmers and waterbody lease holders.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through District Fisheries Development Office.

schemes.name: Fisheries Post-Harvest & Cold Chain Support (PMMSY Component)
schemes.department: Department of Fisheries, Government of India
schemes.description: Provides support for ice plants, cold storage, refrigerated transport and fish processing units.
schemes.benefits: Reduced spoilage, improved quality and better market access.
schemes.eligibility: FPOs, cooperatives, entrepreneurs and fisheries producer groups.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through District Fisheries Office or State Implementing Agency.
